cause.description:
Started by the coolest group ever "I LOVE TO PARTY(and I'm underage)!!
join us now and share n check out stories, pics and vidz of hot parties n experiences. also get tips on how 2 b perfect party girl or Klub King!!
1. i should b able 2 drink away my liver
2. i should b able 2 smoke away my lungs
3. i should b able 2 inhale away my head
cause.mission: bring down drinkin n clubbn age to 14
cause.name: I LOVE to PARTY!!
